name.description: Name that identifies this Container model.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Container model.

service.description: Link to the storage service where this container is hosted in.

parent.description: Link to the parent container under which this entity sits.

dataModel.description: References to the container's data model, if data is structured, or null otherwise

prefix.description: Optional prefix path defined for this container

numberOfObjects.description: The number of objects/files this container has.

size.description: The total size in KB this container has.

fileFormats.description: File & data formats identified for the container:  e.g. dataFormats=[csv, json]. These can be present both when the container has a dataModel or not

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
